reviewId.description: The Review ID of a canceled, active, or completed review related to the case.

reviewReferenceId.description: The Review reference ID of a canceled, active, or completed review related to the case.

reviewStatus.description: The status description of the canceled, active, or completed review related to the case.

distributionDate.description: The date if this selection was distributed.

receivedDate.description: The date if the binder has been recieved for this selection.

requestedDate.description: The date if the binder has been requested for this selection.

selectionDate.description: The date that this selection was created.

selectionStatus.description: The status of this selection. (e.g. Selected, Requested, Received, Distributed, Exception, Cancelled)

caseNumber.description: The case number for the loan selection
